item.description:
The return of the ever popular Great Brook Saturday event. Open to all abilities, we break up into groups based on experience/fitness. Bring a picnic lunch if you like!

Be inside the barn by the big door and READY TO SKI by 10:00 AM. Great Brook rents all kinds of gear rental fee $13, trail passes are $12, and it is CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY.

You know that this winter has been sparse for snow and we're more than halfway through the season, so get it while the getting is good!!! Put off those errands for a day with no snow!!

Contact each other for carpooling.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the Santa hat....

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Great Brook Saturday 10:00 AM
